mapper.select: SELECT * FROM game as g INNER JOIN stadium as s ON g.stadium_idx = s.stadium_idx WHERE g.user_idx=#{user_idx} ORDER BY g.game_idx DESC LIMIT 0, #{cnt}
SELECT * FROM game as g INNER JOIN stadium as s ON g.stadium_idx = s.stadium_idx WHERE g.user_idx=#{user_idx} AND g.end_time_mill >= #{now_time_mill}
SELECT * FROM game as g INNER JOIN user as u ON g.user_idx = u.user_idx INNER JOIN stadium as s ON g.stadium_idx = s.stadium_idx WHERE g.user_idx=#{user_idx}

SELECT * FROM game as g INNER JOIN user as u ON g.user_idx = u.user_idx INNER JOIN manager as m ON u.user_idx = m.user_idx INNER JOIN stadium as s ON g.stadium_idx = s.stadium_idx WHERE g.game_idx=#{game_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `game` ( user_idx, stadium_idx, start_date, weekday, start_hr, start_time_str, start_time_mill, end_time_mill, period_hr, num_to_num, hw_mny_team, gender, team_or_person, free_or_pay, end_game_ny, price, content, player_cnt, modified_date, created_date ) VALUES ( #{user_idx}, #{stadium_idx}, #{start_date}, #{weekday}, #{start_hr}, #{start_time_str}, #{start_time_mill}, #{end_time_mill}, #{period_hr}, #{num_to_num}, #{hw_mny_team}, #{gender}, #{team_or_person}, #{free_or_pay}, #{end_game_ny}, #{price}, #{content}, #{player_cnt}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE() )
